title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 603.4 - Architectural fees for design and supervision of construction of buildings and sponsor services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 603.4 - Architectural fees for design and supervision of construction of buildings and sponsor services

State Regulations

The fees for architectural services shall not exceed the
amounts determined from the schedule of fees established by the chancellor or
designee. In addition, the college shall not be charged for duplicate
administrative, design, or construction supervision services associated with
the project. Any such fees must be approved by the college
trustees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
603.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
